DOC.brief_summary: The current study explore relationship health OEF/OIF Veteran population . Specifically , study examine PTSD symptom severity , traumatic brain injury , relationship satisfaction , leisure , general health rating , feeling burdensomeness belongingness , suicidal ideation .
DOC.detailed_description: United States military troop return home Operation Enduring Freedom Operation Iraqi Freedom deployments present `` invisible wound '' . These `` invisible wound '' include mental health condition posttraumatic stress disorder traumatic brain injury . Recent literature begin explore PTSD affect service member , well significant others . Several study show Veteran endorsement PTSD symptom associate decreased relationship satisfaction . Prior literature show spending time together engage pleasurable activity couple important strategy endure relationship quality satisfaction . Literature demonstrate moderate relationship PTSD suicidal ideation . A previous study conduct two investigator population show perceived feeling burdensomeness belongingness identification suicide potential strategy deal feeling . Joiner hypothesize acquire capacity painful experience , perceive burdensomeness thwart belongingness three component increase suicide risk . Yet study exist examine construct military population , though research indicate clinical utility explore construct related consequence .
